name: Manufactory: Automation Cataclysm
description:
In the future the robots take over humanity and aim to destroy all humans on earth. stop them by fighting back with an ironic force of automation!

Wiki: https://manufactory-automation-cataclysm.fandom.com/wiki/Manufactory:_Automation...

This is a prototype version for this game! If you have any recommendations or have found any bugs please contact me  through my discord LiamofElites#8152
